actions: Invigorates the Blood, dispels Blood Stasis and inhibits the growth of cancer cells.
Clears Heat, relieves Fire toxicity, disperses swellings, improves the throat and inhibits the growth of cancer cells.
Inhibits the growth of cancer cells

symptoms: A localized pricking sensation in the chest and back
manifestations.tongue: Dark blue or red with echymoses
manifestations.tongueCoat: Thick and greasy or Thin white or yellow
manifestations.pulse: Deep, sluggish and choppy or Choppy and uneven or Rapid and forceful
